tooltip.storagenetwork.simple_kabel: Used to connect inventory to the network

tile.storagenetwork:request.name: Storage Request Table
item.storagenetwork:upgrade_0.name: Speed Upgrade
item.storagenetwork:upgrade_1.name: Operation Upgrade
item.storagenetwork:upgrade_2.name: Stack Upgrade
item.storagenetwork:upgrade_3.name: Stock Upgrade
tooltip.storagenetwork.upgrade_1: Activity of the cable depends on the amount of items
tooltip.storagenetwork.upgrade_2: Increases the stack size of task
tooltip.storagenetwork.upgrade_3: Keeps a specific amount of items in the attached inventory (only in export cable)
item.storagenetwork:remote_0.name: Storage Remote
item.storagenetwork:remote_1.name: Advanced Storage Remote
item.storagenetwork:remote_2.name: Upgraded Storage Remote
item.storagenetwork:remote_3.name: Simple Storage Remote
tooltip.storagenetwork.remote_0: Used to access the network 64 blocks distance
tooltip.storagenetwork.remote_1: Used to access the network from unlimited distance and across dimensions
tooltip.storagenetwork.remote_2: Used to access the network from unlimited distance
tooltip.storagenetwork.remote_3: Network without crafting from unlimited distance
item.storagenetwork:picker_remote.name: Network Picker Remote
item.storagenetwork:picker_remote.toolti: Tapping on a block will pull matching blocks from the network
item.storagenetwork:collector_remote.too: Items picked up are moved into the network
gui.storagenetwork.refresh: Refresh processing transactions, so if it is stuck waiting for a result, this will swap it back to recipe mode to gather ingredients.
gui.storagenetwork.fil.tooltip_3: Clear text with right-click or X button
tile.storagenetwork:controller.name: Controller
tooltip.storagenetwork.controller: Manage all Processing Cables in the network
tile.storagenetwork:inventory.name: Storage Inventory
gui.storagenetwork.processing.recipe: Ingredients for each cycle will be sent as if coming from this block-side
gui.storagenetwork.processing.extract: When pulling processing results it will be taken as if from this block-side
